nodes.text: Korev VII was an astronomical object that occupied the seventh orbital position in the Korev system, a part of the Zaric sector in the Slice portion of the Inner Rim. At some point between 0 ABY and 4 ABY, Moff Linis of the Galactic Empire issued from Korev VII a bounty on the Wookiee Cherioer.

Korev VII was introduced in the 1994 Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game supplement Galaxy Guide 10: Bounty Hunters, which was written by Rick D. Stuart for West End Games. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Korev system, and therefore Korev VII, in grid square N-9.
